title: KEXP Digital Music Importer
description: A web application overhauling KEXP's audio ingest process. Allows DJs and programming staff to add new music to the station's library from anywhere. Aggregates essential music metadata and prepares audio files for on-air broadcast within seconds. When you hear a new single debut on KEXP, chances are it went through this tool.
note: The code for this project is proprietary, images demonstrating basic UX are provided with permission from KEXP

title: DishSpinner
description: A simplified take on the classic 'chore wheel'. Use it with a group of roommates, children, or co-workers to take turns performing a household task.

title: KEXP Live Playlist
description: A clone of KEXP's real-time playlist. Uses the station's public API to display songs played in the last hour. Features a basic comment system, allowing DJs to update each track with links and additional context. Originally written as a demo app, I am currently working on making significant changes to securely deploy this demo in production.

title: Project Name
description: This project is still in development
note: We'll see what it turns into
